Package com.siemens.ct.exi.datatype.charset

EXI may use restricted character sets retrieved from XML Schema facets/patterns.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RestrictedCharacterSet If a string value is associated with a schema datatype and one or more of the datatypes in its datatype hierarchy has one or more pattern facets, there may be a restricted character set defined for the string value.
 

Class Summary
AbstractRestrictedCharacterSet  
CodePointCharacterSet Utility class to build a RestrictedCharacterSet by a given Set.
XSDBase64CharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:base64Binary http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDBooleanCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:boolean http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDDateTimeCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:dateTime http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDDecimalCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:decimal http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDDoubleCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:double http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDHexBinaryCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:hexBinary http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDIntegerCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:integer http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
XSDStringCharacterSet Built-In Restricted Character Set for xsd:integer http://www.w3.org/TR/exi/#builtInRestrictedStrings
 

Package com.siemens.ct.exi.datatype.charset Description

EXI may use restricted character sets retrieved from XML Schema facets/patterns.
In addition a given CharSet is provided for built-in datatypes such as boolean, integer, et cetera.
